chapters.title: Chapter 13: Business in the City
chapters.info: Ilain Dormaile, p. 179—Slim, graying, small woman, a full hand shorter than Moiraine. Moiraine's father banked with her older brother, who still handles Moiraine's accounts in Cairhien, making Ilain an obvious choice for her banker in Tar Valon. She is very secretive on her customers' behalf.
